    • Method Detail

      • getPathInFolder

        public static java.nio.file.Path getPathInFolder(java.nio.file.Path folder,
                                                 java.nio.file.Path file)
        Gets path in a folder for the specified file (preserves filename)
        Parameters:
        folder - Folder to put the file in
        file - File to put in the folder
        Returns:
        File path in the folder (may collide)
        See Also:
        getUnusedNumberedPathInFolder(java.nio.file.Path, java.nio.file.Path)

      • getUnusedNumberedPathInFolder

        public static java.nio.file.Path getUnusedNumberedPathInFolder(java.nio.file.Path folder,
                                                               java.nio.file.Path file)
        Tries to add to the number after the filename until there are no collisions in the specified folder
        Parameters:
        folder - Folder to put the file in
        file - File to put in the folder
        Returns:
        File path which will definitely not collide in the folder
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - If you have Integer.MAX_VALUE + 1 files with the same name (that does not happen often)
        See Also:
        getPathInFolder(java.nio.file.Path, java.nio.file.Path)

      • readAllFromURL

        public static java.lang.String readAllFromURL(java.lang.String urlString)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        urlString - URL as string
        Returns:
        Read string
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If any error occurs during reading
